instructions.1: Line bottom and sides of an 8 inch springform pan with split ladyfingers.
instructions.2: Combine 1 cup orange juice and sugar in saucepan; heat until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat. Soften gelatin in 1 cup orange juice then stir in hot juice. Add remaining orange juice, lemon juice and salt. Chill until slightly thickened.
instructions.3: Whip the cream until stiff and fold into the gelatin mixture. Fold in orange sections and spoon into the prepared pan. Chill for at least 4 hours. Remove sides of pan and place on a serving plate. Garnish with fresh strawberries.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the gelatin from Step 2 being used?
Is gelatin from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is split ladyfingers from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to use the gelatin in Step 3?
